reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, comfortable, and well-fitting, noting it hits right at the ankle bone.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Event Dress
items.body: Loved the quality, fit and color of this dress. I wore it to a wedding and I loved the look and yet was soo comfortable during the whole wedding. The length was perfect as I am shorty. Perfect even dress. Read more
items.author: Estella Mercado

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded Expectations
items.body: This dress is beautiful. It's a quality, well-made dress that looks more expensive than it actually is - always a nice bonus! The material is thicker/heavier than expected with beautiful ribbing. The waistline pulls everything in and is very flattering. Actually, this dress fit me perfectly, which is usually a struggle for me without making alterations. (I am 5'2" and roughly 140, and bought a size S.) The hem fell mid-shin which was perfect for pairing with black heels. This was worn for a holiday party and I got many compliments. Would be perfect for any semi-formal occasion, or even just a fun night out. Read more
items.author: Lori T.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent fit and reasonably priced
items.body: Love this very comfortable and elegant dress, purchased medium and I am 5'2" and 138lbs. Length is just at the top of my foot, and was perfect with flats. I am a 34D bust and it fit perfectly, with the V showing covering just enough. The elastic in the back was very comfortable, no need for shapewear. I wore the dress to a fall wedding and it was perfect. I suggest a shawl or jacket to go over the dress for warmth. The color is teal green and the burnout velvet is rust, vivid and lovely for fall. Read more
items.author: mscwood

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable!
items.body: I bought this to wear for Christmas, maternity photos, and my baby shower. It’s perfect for all 3 and will be great after pregnancy too. The color and style are as pictured, sizing is true to size and it has some stretch to it which makes it super comfortable. Only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the velvet nap is upside down so when you run your hand downwards it’s on the rough side and upwards is the soft side (although my friend who knows clothing construction said that’s because the color is more vibrant that way. Just something to note if textures are a big deal to you). Read more
items.author: Liz Faxon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get ready for compliments!
items.body: I ordered the burgundy dress, oh my goodness it is luxurious, royal color and breathtaking. Fits true to size. Love the length. The fabric is a medium weight great for Fall/Winter. Paired it with bold gold accessories and shoes. It fit the occasion beautifully and I received so many compliments. If you are full figure do not shy away from this dress, it will be a great addition to your wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress and great value
items.body: Just got this delivered today. I'm 168lbs, 5'5, and fit in between a M and L. The medium fits perfectly! The dress is so soft, and it's very flowy, goes just to my ankles. Can't recommend it enough!! The teal shine is gorgeous in person as well! There are no pockets, that would be one way to improve the dress. Mine did not have a bad smell Read more
items.author: Lacey R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, comfortable dress
items.body: This dress is beautiful! The champagne color is as expected and the ribbing is almost shimmery. The material is not too thin, not too heavy. It’s soft, flowy, and so comfy it almost feels like a cozy robe but it looks elegant. I would definitely buy more colors. Read more
items.author: Ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best dresses I've ever worn
items.body: I absolutely love this dress and I came back on to order some more in different colors! Was the perfect length for me and I am 5'4". It was a little bit loose in the back under my neck and in the front. I am a 34C so if you are a little bit more busty it should be fine. If not maybe go down a size. My hips are a little bit wider than average and I thought it fit very nicely in that area. Not too snug and very nice and flowy. Read more
items.author: RONA GOODEN

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Short Sleeve Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Short Sleeve Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Velvet 4#dark Pink, Velvet 4#navy Blue, Velvet 4#burnt Orange, Velvet 4#wine Red, Velvet Burnout 4#black Floral, Velvet 4#pinkish Purple, Velvet-Plus Size P-emerald Green, Velvet-Plus Size P-pumpkin Orange, Velvet 4#chocolate Brown, Velvet Burnout 4#burgundy Floral, Velvet 4#green, Velvet 4#blue Green, Velvet 4#emerald Green, Velvet Burnout-Plus Size P-black-2. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
